page.title: 02HOUSES IN S.CROYDON
page.content: My house is on the Brighton Rd.My house was built in 1883.It is a Victorian house.Since moving into our house we have put in new windows,a new front door and tiled the roof.At the back of my garden there is an alleyway.It used to be a railway line but you cannot see the rails.We have got used to the traffic noises.The garden is quite big and has a lawn,shed and fruit trees. Valerie's house is large and detached with a green slate roof.It has windows of wood and aluminium and a glass front door.It has a big garden with flower beds,trees and a fish pond.There is a big lawn,a shed and a greenhouse.The house is on Pampisford Rd.,up the hill from Brighton Rd.
